DC CODE § 8-115.05a

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Lead-Based Paint Abatement and Control. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Required training of employees of a business entity performing interim controls and certain lead-based paint activities. [Repealed]
